column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The décor of Bavette's is very classy; low lighting
column4: and incredibly comfortable leather booths.  To be fair
column5: the low lighting can make it a little difficult to navigate the seating area when you first walk in and we all cut corners a little too tight around some of the tables.  That said
column6: definitely like the feel of the place.
